name: @huggingface/doc-internal
description: Package to generate doc for other @huggingface packages

scripts.start: pnpm run fix-cdn-versions && pnpm run doc-hub && pnpm run doc-inference && pnpm run doc-agents && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm run update-toc && pnpm run fix-md-links && pnpm run fix-md-headinghashlinks
scripts.prepublish-hub: pnpm run fix-cdn-versions && pnpm run doc-hub && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm run update-toc && pnpm run fix-md-links && pnpm run fix-md-headinghashlinks
scripts.prepublish-inference: pnpm run fix-cdn-versions && pnpm run doc-inference && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm run update-toc && pnpm run fix-md-links && pnpm run fix-md-headinghashlinks
scripts.prepublish-agents: pnpm run fix-cdn-versions && pnpm run doc-agents && cp ../../README.md ../../docs/index.md && pnpm run update-toc && pnpm run fix-md-links && pnpm run fix-md-headinghashlinks
